verse.name: v1
verse.lines: When He cometh, when He cometh To make up His jewels, All His jewels, precious jewels, His loved and His own:

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Like the stars of the morning, His bright crown adorning, They shall shine in their beauty, Bright gems for His crown.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: He will gather, He will gather The gems for His kingdom, All the pure ones, all the bright ones, His loved and His own:

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Little children, little children Who love their Redeemer, Are the jewels, precious jewels, His loved and His own:
